a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Human Development Index vs. Augmented Human Development Index,
The Human Development Index (HDI) is a summary measure of key dimensions of human development: a long and healthy
life, a good education, and a decent standard of living. The Augmented Human Development Index (AHDI) includes a fourth
dimension related to civil and political freedom.
Data source: UNDP, Human Development Report (2024); Leandro Prados de la Escosura (2021)
